name: Simplegradingscale2.0
body:
### Simple Grading Scale 2.0.

This grading scale gives a decimal grade for up to 200 hundred questions. It can give you a score from the number of problems missed or a score for the number of problems answered correctly



### Authors and Contributors
Sedrick Jefferson(@sedj601).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Feel free to email me at [sedrick.work@gmail.com] (sedrick.work@gmail.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
